addr: between West 133rd and 135th Street on Convent Avenue. The entrance is located on Convent Avenue. New York, NY 10027
title: Winter Meetup & Toy Drive
desc:
Silicon Harlem Winter Meetup and Toy Drive 
 Please join us on December 8th at Aaron Davis Hall where you can donate unwrapped toys, gifts or donations, enjoy music, food and networking as we enter the giving season. 
 
 Where: AARON DAVIS HALL located on the campus of The City College of New York,?between West 133rd and 135th Street on Convent Avenue.?The entrance is located on Convent Avenue. 
 
 This year we?re proud to support the Salvation Army. The toys will go to 2 different Harlem locations. 
 
 
 
 
 Directions to Aaron Davis Hall 
 By Train 
 
 1?train to? 137th Street-City College 
 Walk south on Broadway to 135th Street. Walk two blocks east to Convent Avenue and 135th Street. 
 
 A,?B,?C, or?D?train to? 145th Street 
 Walk one block west along 145th Street to Convent Avenue. Walk south along Convent Avenue (through the City College campus) to Convent Avenue and 135th Street. 
 
 By Bus 
 
 M100,?M101, or?M11?bus to? 135th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 
 Walk one block east along 135th Street to Convent Avenue. 
 
 M4?or?M5?bus to? 135th Street and Broadway. 
 Walk two blocks east along 135th Street to Convent Avenue. 
 
 By Car 
 
 FREE ON-SITE PARKING in the South Campus Parking Lot 
 (enter at 133rd Street and Convent Avenue) 
 
 From the?Westside Highway: 
 Exit at 125th Street, cross Broadway, one block; left onto Amsterdam Avenue; right onto 133rd Street and drive one block to Convent Avenue. 
 
 From the?East Side: 
 From the FDR or the Triborough Bridge to? Harlem River Drive , exit at 145th Street; turn left onto Amsterdam Avenue; turn right onto 133rd Street and drive one block to Convent Avenue.
